mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, C.STUDY_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, C.COMMENT_TEXT, TO_CHAR(C.COMMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS COMMENT_DATE FROM STUDY_COMMENT C, STUDY S, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO AND S.STUDY_NO = C.STUDY_NO AND C.STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} ORDER BY C.COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_COMMENT(COMMENT_NO, STUDY_NO, COMMENT_TEXT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_STUDY_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{studyNo}, #{commentText}, #{memberNo})
